extensionDescription.message: This add-on works by blocking notifications and push request for page notifications.
extensionDescription.description: This add-on works by blocking notifications and push request for page notifications.

works.message:
Tired of receiving page notifications or being bothered by them asking permission to send notifications? Don't bother with that anymore!
The nBother add-on works by blocking the operation of web notifications, and can be activated in the toolbar by clicking on the shield icon, when it is green it is turned on and red turned off. The add-on starts by default enabled, on mobile devices you do not need to open the Add-ons Manager to activate it.

note.message: Note: This Add-on is completely free! Please consider make a small donation or write an review in addons.mozilla.org. Thank you!

bugs.message: If you find any bugs, have any suggestions or some ideas for this add-on. Please create a new issue.
